title: Speed Optimization
subtitle: Boost speed & Core Web Vitals
description: Optimize loading time and pass Core Web Vitals assessments.

faq.q1: How fast will my site apply?
faq.a1: We aim for scores of 90+ on Google PageSpeed Insights and loading times under 2 seconds. However, results depend on your hosting and site complexity.
faq.a2: Yes, the optimization is a one-time project. However, adding non-optimized content later can slow it down again.
faq.q3: Do you need access to my hosting?
faq.a3: Yes, we typically need FTP/SFTP access and admin access to your WordPress dashboard or server.
faq.q4: Will this break my site design?
faq.a4: We act carefully to ensure optimizations do not affect visual layout. We test everything on a staging environment first.
